CustomField.formula: IF( Payment_Plan_Balance__c > 0 , "You are currently on a payment plan and your payment will be made via autopay.", IF(Parent_Account__r.Recurring_Billing__c = TRUE, "You are currently on autopay, you do not need to submit a payment online. If you would like to be removed from autopay please give us a call at 844.SUN.4100."," "))
CustomField.label: Message to put on Bill
